amendment.description: To develop a strategy for combining terrorist travel intelligence, operations, and law enforcement, and for other purposes.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3807 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3807 proposed by Senator McCain. (consideration: CR S10009-10011) To develop a strategy for combining terrorist travel intelligence, operations, and law enforcement, and for other purposes.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3807 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3807 proposed by Senator McCain.
